name: TableGrowingMode

values.name: Button
values.description: Renders a growing button, which can be pressed to load more data.
values._jsDoc:
/**
 * Renders a growing button, which can be pressed to load more data.
 *
 * @public
 */

values.name: Scroll
values.description:
Scroll to load more data.

**Note:** If the table is not scrollable, a growing button will be rendered instead to ensure growing functionality.
values._jsDoc:
/**
 * Scroll to load more data.
 * 
 * **Note:** If the table is not scrollable, a growing button will be rendered instead to ensure growing functionality.
 *
 * @public
 */

_jsDoc:

 *
